name: Lands of Lore: Guardians of Destiny
description: Uses the windows GOG installer and run through dosbox without emulated 3dfx hw accelaration

files.installer:
N/A:Select the GOG.com game setup file. Download it here: 
https://www.gog.com/downloads/lands_of_lore_guardians_of_destiny/en1installer1

content:
files:
- installer: "N/A:Select the GOG.com game setup file. Download it here: \nhttps://www.gog.com/downloads/lands_of_lore_guardians_of_destiny/en1installer1\n"
- fileextract: https://lutris.net/files/tools/innoextract.tar.gz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxLOL2.conf
  main_file: DOSBOX/dosboxLOL2_single.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $fileextract
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$installer"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/app
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosboxLOL2_single.conf
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxLOL2.conf
    key: output
    section: sdl
    value: opengl
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxLOL2.conf
    key: fulldouble
    section: sdl
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxLOL2.conf
    key: fullresolution
    section: sdl
    value: desktop
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxLOL2.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxLOL2.conf
    key: scaler
    section: render
    value: normal2x
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxLOL2.conf
    key: cputype
    section: cpu
    value: auto
